docs.snippet: Niche firms tailor their clothing to meet the needs of special body types....
docs.lead_paragraph: Niche firms tailor their clothing to meet the needs of special body types.
docs.abstract: Niche fashion firms tailor their clothing to meet needs of special body types; such brands are thriving because, unlike most shoppers who are overwhelmed by choice, hard-to-fit customers have limited options and tend to be loyalists.

headline.seo: Big and Tall? Clothing Companies Fit the Needs of Those Shopping for Different Sizes and Body Types
headline.main: If the Size Fits, Build a Following
headline.print_headline: If the Size Fits, Build a Following
